mapper.select: SELECT T2.CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , T2.CNTR_SN /* 계약일련번호 */ , T5.PRTNR_NO AS SALE_PRTNR_NO /* 판매자 사번 */ , T6.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO AS SALE_HP_TEL1 /* 판매자 휴대지역번호 */ , T6.MEXNO_ENCR AS SALE_HP_TEL2 /* 판매자 휴대전화국번호 */ , T6.CRAL_IDV_TNO AS SALE_HP_TEL3 /* 판매자 휴대전화번호 */ , T8.RCGVP_KNM AS CUST_NM /* 고객명 */ , T9.BZRNO AS CUST_BIZNO /* 법인고객 사업자 번호 */ , T8.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO AS CUST_HP_TEL1 /* 고객 휴대지역번호 */ , T8.MEXNO_ENCR AS CUST_HP_TEL2 /* 고객 휴대전화국번호 */ , T8.CRAL_IDV_TNO AS CUST_HP_TEL3 /* 고객 휴대전화번호 */ , T8.LOCARA_TNO AS CUST_AR_TEL1 /* 고객 지역전화번호 */ , T8.EXNO_ENCR AS CUST_AR_TEL2 /* 고객 전화국번호 */ , T8.IDV_TNO AS CUST_AR_TEL3 /* 고객 개별전화번호 */ , T10.NEW_ADR_ZIP AS CUST_ZIP /* 고객 신우편번호 */ , T10.RNADR AS CUST_ADDR1 /* 고객 도로명주소 */ , T10.RDADR AS CUST_ADDR2 /* 고객 도로명상세주소 */ , T2.PDCT_PD_CD /* 설치 제품코드 */ , T11.SELL_TP_CD /* 판매유형코드 */ , T2.SV_HSHD_NO /* 가구코드 */ , T3.FXN_PRTNR_NO /* 고정파트너번호 */ , T3.VST_NMN_N /* 방푼차월수 */ , T12.PD_ABBR_NM AS PD_ABBR_NM /* 제품약어 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS','SELL_TP_CD', T11.SELL_TP_CD, 'ko') AS SELL_TP_NM /* 판매유형명 */ , T4.PRTNR_KNM AS FXN_PRTNR_NM /* 고정파트너명 */ FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T2 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T3 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN AND T2.SV_HSHD_NO = T3.SV_HSHD_NO AND T3.MNGT_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T4 ON T3.MNGT_YM = T4.BASE_YM AND T3.FXN_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = T4.OG_TP_CD AND T3.FXN_PRTNR_NO = T4.PRTNR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_PRTNR_REL T5 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T5.CNTR_NO AND T5.CNTR_PRTNR_TP_CD = '010' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T5.VL_STRT_DTM AND T5.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T6 ON T5.OG_TP_CD = T6.OG_TP_CD AND T5.PRTNR_NO = T6.PRTNR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T7 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T7.DTL_CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T7.DTL_CNTR_SN AND T7.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T7.VL_STRT_DTM AND T7.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T8 ON T7.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T8.CNTR_ADRPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T9 ON T8.CNTR_CST_NO = T9.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T10 ON T8.ADR_ID = T10.ADR_ID INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T11 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T11.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T11.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T12 ON T2.PDCT_PD_CD = T12.PD_CD WHERE T2.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T2.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND ROWNUM < 100 ORDER BY T2.CNTR_NO, T2.CNTR_SN, T3.VST_NMN_N
